content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements this pdf also includes both women s and girls sizes ponchos are great to wear for seasonal transition pieces they re also great for late night bonfires when the air gets chilly dress them up dress them down you really can t go wrong with a poncho **purchase the women s kit here 2 ** lion brand has a full kit of the wasilla women s poncho available on their website the kit includes your choice of 5 colorways and a printed copy of the pattern below **purchase the girl s kit here 3 ** lion brand has a full kit of the girls wasilla poncho available on their website the kit includes your choice of 4 colorways and a printed copy of the pattern below **yarn notes ** lion brand mandala in centaur was used for the sample in the photos another similar dk weight / 3 yarn may be substituted as long as gauge can be met poncho is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2019 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/wasilla-poncho-free-crochet-poncho-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/1smdw 3 http //shrsl com/1sme1
